publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3079 Stewart Stevenson: Hepatitis Câ€”That the Parliament notes that MSPs of the Scottish Socialist Party regarded unparliamentary interventions in the Chamber as more important than the interests of Scots infected by Hepatitis C within the NHS and demands that they apologise to Hepatitis C-affected families for their infantile behaviour and for their personal role in losing the opportunity for the Parliament to right a wrong.
S2M-3079 Hepatitis C (lodged on 1 July 2005) Michael Matheson*
